mapper.select: SELECT h.*,u.unickname FROM hugi h INNER JOIN user u ON h.unum = u.unum ORDER BY h.hwriteday DESC
mapper.insert: insert into hugi (hcontent, hphoto, hwriteday, hlike, unum) values (#{hcontent}, #{hphoto}, now(), 0, #{unum})
mapper.update: update hugi set hlike=hlike+1 where hnum=#{hnum}
mapper.select: select unickname from user where unum=#{unum}
